about_the_game: Immerse yourself in the deeply atmospheric Martha Is Dead soundtrack with almost 2 hours of captivating, eclectic music that both captures the characteristic sound of the historical period and enhances the foreboding atmosphere of the game. Featuring underwater music specialists Between Music and their Aquasonic project; the moody yet spinetingling tones of The Town of Light composer, Aseptic Void, along with reinterpretations of classic songs and original tracks written and sung by Francesca Messina, AKA 90s disco star, Femina Ridens.

content_descriptors.notes: Martha Is Dead is only recommended for an adult audience and is not recommended for players who may find depictions containing blood, dismemberment, disfigurement of human bodies, minor nudity, and self-harm disturbing.

detailed_description:
WISHLIST MEOW! 😻


About the Game

Immerse yourself in the deeply atmospheric Martha Is Dead soundtrack with almost 2 hours of captivating, eclectic music that both captures the characteristic sound of the historical period and enhances the foreboding atmosphere of the game. Featuring underwater music specialists Between Music and their Aquasonic project; the moody yet spinetingling tones of The Town of Light composer, Aseptic Void, along with reinterpretations of classic songs and original tracks written and sung by Francesca Messina, AKA 90s disco star, Femina Ridens.
